message: Great! I found Pepperoni on our menu for AED 43.0. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. While placing your order, please provide me with your NYU ID (exactly 8 digits), building code (A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and your UAE mobile number.

To complete your order, please provide me with your NYU ID (exactly 8 digits), building code (e.g., A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C) and your UAE mobile number. Once I have all this information, I can proceed with confirming your order for a Pepperoni pizza priced at AED 43.00.

I see that the NYU ID provided is 8 digits long but it does not match any valid NYU ID format. Please provide your NYU ID in this format: XXXX XXXX. Also, please provide a valid UAE mobile number starting with '5'. This will help me confirm your order for the Pepperoni pizza priced at AED 43.00.

To finalize your order for the Pepperoni pizza priced at AED 43.00, please provide me with your NYU ID (exactly 8 digits), building code (e.g., A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and your UAE mobile number starting with '5'. Once I have all this information, I can proceed with confirming your order.
